Public MustInherit Class ButtonBase Inherits Control
public ref class ButtonBase abstract : System::Windows::Forms::Control

summary.span: 实现按钮控件共同的基本功能。

span.span: Implements the basic functionality common to button controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您通常不继承自。You do not typically inherit from . 若要创建您自己的按钮类，继承自， ，或类。To create your own button class, inherit from the , , or class. 如果希望派生的按钮控件显示的图像，请设置属性或和属性。To have the derived button control display an image, set the property or the and properties. 图像可以通过设置对齐按钮控件上属性。The image can be aligned on the button control by setting the property. 同样，若要对齐显示在按钮控件上，设置属性。Likewise, to align the displayed on the button control, set the property. 属性确定的样式和控件的外观。The property determines the style and appearance of the control. 如果属性设置为，用户的操作系统确定控件的外观。If the property is set to , the user's operating system determines the appearance of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否要在控件的右边缘显示省略号 (...) 以表示控件文本超出指定的控件长度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the ellipsis character (...) appears at the right edge of the control, denoting that the control text extends beyond the specified length of the control.

value.span: 如果要通过省略号指示附加标签文本，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the additional label text is to be indicated by an ellipsis; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置到`true`显示超出控件的宽度，当用户通过使用鼠标控件上方时的文本。Set to `true` to display text that extends beyond the width of the control when the user passes over the control with the mouse. 必须设置控件的`AutoSize`属性设置为`false`如果你想为`true`。You must set the control's `AutoSize` property to `false` if you want to be `true`. 如果`AutoSize`是`true`，控件将放大以适合文本，并且将不会显示一个省略号。If `AutoSize` is `true`, the control will grow to fit the text and an ellipsis will not appear.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含继承的类型的实例的项目，如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然后该实例命名`ButtonBase1`，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。Then name the instance `ButtonBase1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 获取或设置按钮控件的平面样式外观。

span.span: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the button control.
One of the values.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时的属性并类设置为`System`，则控件会绘制为用户的操作系统，检查对齐方式基于`CheckAlign`和属性值。When the property of the and classes is set to `System`, the control is drawn by the user's operating system and the check alignment is based upon the `CheckAlign` and property values. `CheckAlign`属性值不变，但可能会受影响控件的外观。The `CheckAlign` property value is not changed, but the appearance of the control can be affected. 复选框 （左侧或居中对齐方式显示左对齐、 右保持不变） 的控件，向左或右边缘与水平对齐和垂直方向对齐的描述性文本相同。The check box is horizontally aligned with either the left or right edge of the control (a left or center alignment appears left aligned, right remains unchanged), and vertically aligned the same as the descriptive text. 例如，如果你有控件，其`CheckAlign`属性值为`ContentAlignment`。For example, if you have a control with a `CheckAlign` property value of `ContentAlignment`. `MiddleCenter`属性值为`ContentAlignment.TopRight`，并属性值设置为`System`，复选框对齐方式将显示为`ContentAlignment.TopLeft`时的文本对齐方式将保持不变。`MiddleCenter`, a property value of `ContentAlignment.TopRight`, and the property value is set to `System`, the check box alignment will appear to be `ContentAlignment.TopLeft` while the text alignment remains unchanged. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为`FlatStyle.System`，分配给任何映像属性不会显示。If the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the property are not displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中，和设置的某些常见属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 结果将是一个平面具有文本左侧和右侧图像按钮。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 此代码需要具有名为位图图像`MyBitMap.bmp`存储在`C:\Graphics`目录中，并且对引用命名空间是包括在内。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

span.span: The value assigned is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Size GetPreferredSize(valuetype System.Drawing.Size proposedSize) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetPreferredSize (proposedSize As Size) As Size

param.name: proposedSize
param.span: 控件的自定义大小的区域。

span.span: The custom-sized area for a control.

summary.span: 检索适合控件的矩形区域的大小。

span.span: Retrieves the size of a rectangular area into which a control can be fitted.

returns.span: 类型为 的有序对，表示矩形的宽度和高度。

span.span: An ordered pair of type representing the width and height of a rectangle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 行为控件上不同。The behavior of differs by control. 可能无法分配给控件返回的大小。The might be unable to assign the returned size to the control. 返回的大小大于所示的约束`proposedSize`参数，但`proposedSize`应该随着约束的降低而降低。You can return a size larger than the constraints indicated in the `proposedSize` parameter, but `proposedSize` should decrease as the constraint decreases. 例如，`GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))`不能多于`GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`。For example, `GetPreferredSize(new Size(100, 0))` should not be wider than `GetPreferredSize(new Size(200, 0))`. 例外情况是`proposedSize`为 0 或`Size.Empty`，其定义为不受约束。The exception is a `proposedSize` of 0 or `Size.Empty`, which are defined as unconstrained.

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在按钮控件上的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image that is displayed on a button control.
The displayed on the button control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设置属性，则属性将设置为`null`，和属性将设置为其默认值为-1。When the property is set, the property will be set to `null`, and the property will be set to its default, -1. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性设置为`FlatStyle.System`，分配给任何映像属性不会显示。If the property is set to `FlatStyle.System`, any images assigned to the property are not displayed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中，和设置的某些常见属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 结果将是一个平面具有文本左侧和右侧图像按钮。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 此代码需要具有名为位图图像`MyBitMap.bmp`存储在`C:\Graphics`目录中，并且对引用命名空间是包括在内。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. member this.ImageIndex : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置按钮控件上显示的图像的图像列表索引值。

span.span: Gets or sets the image list index value of the image displayed on the button control.

value.span: 从零开始的索引，表示 中的图像位置。

span.span: A zero-based index, which represents the image position in an .
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当或设置的属性，属性设置为其默认值， `null`。When the or properties are set, the property is set to its default value, `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性值更改为`null`，则属性将返回其默认值为-1。If the property value is changed to `null`, the property returns its default value, -1. 但是，则将分配值是保留在内部，当另一个使用对象分配给属性。However, the assigned value is retained internally and used when another object is assigned to the property. 如果新分配给属性具有属性值小于或等于分配给的值，该值减一 （用于帐户正在从零开始的索引的集合），属性属性值调整为一个小于属性值。If the new assigned to the property has an property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the property minus one (to account for the collection being a zero-based index), the property value is adjusted to one less than the property value. 例如，考虑一个按钮控件三个映像且属性设置为 2。For example, consider a button control whose has three images and whose property is set to 2. 如果新有只有两个图像分配给按钮，值更改为 1。If a new that has only two images is assigned to the button, the value changes to 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中， ，并设置和属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets the and properties. 此代码需要已创建的最少一个已分配给它。This code requires that an has been created and a minimum of one has been assigned to it. 此代码还需要具有名为位图图像`MyBitMap.bmp`存储在`C:\Graphics`目录。This code also requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.ImageIndex Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当或属性设置，属性设置`null`，这是其默认值。When the or property is set, the property is set `null`, which is its default value. > [!NOTE] > 如果属性值更改为`null`，则属性将返回其默认值为-1。If the property value is changed to `null`, the property returns its default value, -1. 但是，则将分配值是保留在内部，当另一个使用分配给属性。However, the assigned value is retained internally and used when another is assigned to the property. 如果新分配给属性具有属性值小于或等于分配给的值，该值减一的属性 （因为集合是从零开始的索引），则属性值调整为一个小于属性值。If the new assigned to the property has an property value that is less than or equal to the value assigned to the property minus one (because the collection is a zero-based index), the property value is adjusted to one less than the property value. 例如，考虑一个按钮控件三个映像且属性设置为 2。For example, consider a button control whose has three images and whose property is set to 2. 如果新有只有两个图像分配给按钮，值更改为 1。If a new that has only two images is assigned to the button, the value changes to 1. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中， ，并设置和属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets the and properties. 此代码需要已创建的最少一个已分配给它。This code requires that an has been created and a minimum of one has been assigned to it. 此代码还需要具有名为位图图像`MyBitMap.bmp`存储在`C:\Graphics`目录。This code also requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，通过该值指示按钮控件是否为默认按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the button control is the default button.

value.span: 如果按钮控件是默认按钮，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the button control is the default button; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性设置为`true`，该按钮是默认按钮。When the property is set to `true`, the button is the default button for the . 这意味着如果没有其他按钮按下 ENTER 键或 ENTER 键捕获的任何其他控件具有焦点时，单击该按钮。This means that the button is clicked when the ENTER key is pressed if no other button or any other control that captures the ENTER key has focus. 若要指定窗体的默认按钮，设置到所需的按钮窗体的属性。To specify the default button of a form, set the property of the form to the desired button.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnKeyDown(class System.Windows.Forms.KeyEventArgs kevent) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnKeyDown (kevent As KeyEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. > [!NOTE] > 不要调用如果按钮处于禁用状态 (这包括对基类的调用方法重写时派生类中)。Do not call if the button is disabled (this includes calls to the base class's method when you override in a derived class). 禁用的按钮中的重写时，调用基类的方法，然后再禁用该按钮，或执行所有调用它。When disabling the button in an override of , call the base class's method before disabling the button, or do not call it at all.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生的类中，和设置的某些常见属性。The following code example uses the derived class, and sets some of its common properties. 结果将是一个平面具有文本左侧和右侧图像按钮。The result will be a flat button with text on the left and an image on the right. 此代码需要具有名为位图图像`MyBitMap.bmp`存储在`C:\Graphics`目录中，并且对引用命名空间是包括在内。This code requires that you have a bitmap image named `MyBitMap.bmp` stored in the `C:\Graphics` directory, and that a reference to the namespace is included. [!code-cpp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ButtonBase.FlatStyle Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 分配的值不是 值之一。

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseCompatibleTextRendering { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseCompatibleTextRendering : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值确定是使用 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) 还是 类 ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) 呈现文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether to use the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]) or the class ([!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]) to render text.

value.span: 如果类应该用于执行文本呈现，以便与 1.0 和 1.1 版中的兼容性。

span.span: if the class should be used to perform text rendering for compatibility with versions 1.0 and 1.1.
of the .NET Framework; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性用于提供 visual 兼容性 Windows 窗体控件之间呈现文本使用类和[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]的应用程序执行自定义文本呈现使用类。The `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property is intended to provide visual compatibility between Windows Forms controls that render text using the class and [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)] applications that perform custom text rendering using the class. 在大多数情况下，如果不从升级您的应用程序[!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)]，则建议您保留`UseCompatibleTextRendering`设置的默认值为`false`。In most cases, if your application is not being upgraded from [!INCLUDE[net_v10_short](~/includes/net-v10-short-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[net_v11_short](~/includes/net-v11-short-md.md)], it is recommended that you leave `UseCompatibleTextRendering` set to the default value of `false`. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]基于类中引入了[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]为了提高性能，使文本看起来不错，并提高对国际字体支持。The [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] based class was introduced in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] to improve performance, make text look better, and improve support for international fonts. 在早期版本的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，则[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]基于类用于执行所有文本呈现。In earlier versions of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)], the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] based class was used to perform all text rendering. [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] 计算字符间距和自动换行中的不同[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]。 calculates character spacing and word wrapping differently from [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]. 使用 Windows 窗体应用程序中类来呈现文本，这可能会导致使用的控件的文本才会显示不同的应用程序中的其他文本。In a Windows Forms application that uses the class to render text, this could cause the text for controls that use to appear different from the other text in the application. 若要解决此不兼容性，可以设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`属性设置为`true`特定控件。To resolve this incompatibility, you can set the `UseCompatibleTextRendering` property to `true` for a specific control. 若要设置`UseCompatibleTextRendering`到`true`应用程序中的所有受支持控件，调用方法的参数替换`true`。To set `UseCompatibleTextRendering` to `true` for all supported controls in the application, call the method with a parameter of `true`.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，确定是否使用视觉样式（如果支持）绘制背景。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines if the background is drawn using visual styles, if supported.

value.span: 如果要使用视觉样式绘制背景，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the background is drawn using visual styles; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视觉样式已规范的外观的控件。Visual styles are specifications for the appearance of controls. 例如，视觉样式可定义颜色、 大小和字体的控件，并且它们使您配置与应用程序界面进行协调，可视界面。For example, visual styles can define the color, size, and font of controls, and they enable you to configure the visual interface to coordinate with your application interface. 此外，它们提供所有基于 Windows 的应用程序具有视觉样式应用一种的机制。Additionally, they provide a mechanism for all Windows-based applications to have visual styles applied.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void WndProc (ref System.Windows.Forms.Message m);

span.span: The Windows to process.

summary.span: 处理 Windows 消息。

span.span: Processes Windows messages.
